CustomField.formula: IF( AND( ! CONTAINS(Email, "gmail"), ! CONTAINS(Email, "hotmail"), ! CONTAINS(Email, "mail.com"), ! CONTAINS(Email, "yahoo"), ! CONTAINS(Email, "gmx"), ! CONTAINS(Email, "zoho"), ! CONTAINS(Email, "gawab"), ! CONTAINS(Email, "aol"), ! CONTAINS(Email, "aim"), ! CONTAINS(Email, "lavabit"), ! CONTAINS(Email, "excite"), ! CONTAINS(Email, "lycos") ), RIGHT(Email, LEN(Email) - FIND("@",Email)+0), "Not a valid Company domain" )
CustomField.label: Domain (from email address)
